name: harvey
description: CLI application for long-running AI conversations with intelligent context management

scripts.install-link: bun build ./cli.js && echo '#!/usr/bin/env bun' > harvey && echo 'import("./src/index.tsx")' >> harvey && chmod +x harvey && mv harvey ~/.local/bin/ 2>/dev/null || (echo 'Creating symlink to source...' && ln -sf "$PWD/src/index.tsx" ~/.local/bin/harvey && chmod +x ~/.local/bin/harvey)
scripts.install: bun install --global 2>/dev/null || echo 'Install globally by running: bun link' || bun install && bun run install-link'
